item.title: What products should I use for scalp psoriasis?
item.author: lucystreams+beautyblog@gmail.com (Lucy Rebekah)
item.description: If you have scalp itchiness then one of the common causes is psoriasis. This means you get dry, scaly patches on your scalp. There are other causes of scalp dryness and itchiness like seborrheic dermatitis and dandruff. I’m going to focus on psoriasis because this is what I have and what I know about. But the advice for moisturizing scalp applies for anyone with dry scalp. General scalp dryness and itchiness and advice is discussed below – click HERE to skip ahead.
